metadata.Title: CVE-2020-26137 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: urllib3 before 1.25.9 allows CRLF injection if the attacker controls the HTTP request method, as demonstrated by inserting CR and LF control characters in the first argument of putrequest(). NOTE: this is similar to CVE-2020-26116.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> the python-pip package bundles python-urllib3 binaries when built. After updating python-urllib3, a no-change rebuild of python-pip is required.

criterions.comment: python-pip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
python-urllib3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
